title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.6 - Changes to account information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.6 - Changes to account information

State Regulations

The account wagering licensee shall provide a method for
the account wagering holder to make official changes to his or her account
information. The method shall include the name, date, address, account wagering
identification number, PIN and signature. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
